data.title: Ontario College of Teachers
data.meta_description:
Ontario College of Teachers | 28,228 followers on LinkedIn. Ontario’s Teaching Regulator | The Ontario College of Teachers licenses, governs and regulates Ontario's teaching profession in the public interest.

Teachers who work in publicly funded schools in Ontario must be certified to teach in the province and be members of the College. 

The College sets ethical standards of practice, issues teaching certificates and may suspend or revoke them, accredits teacher education programs and courses, and investigates and hears complaints about members.
data.text:
Have questions about your membership with the College? Members and applicants are strongly encouraged to use the self-serve options available on the College’s website: http://oct-oeeo.ca/info. Please note: documents and payments are not accepted in person. If you cannot upload a document electronically, hard copies can be deposited in the College’s drop box, located behind our office at 101 Bloor Street West, off St. Thomas Street. Vous avez des questions sur votre adhésion à l’Ordre? Nous vous encourageons à utiliser nos options libre-service en ligne à http://oct-oeeo.ca/infofr. N.B. : Nous n’acceptons pas les documents ou paiements en personne. Si vous ne pouvez pas nous envoyer un document électroniquement, vous pouvez le déposer dans la boite située à l’arrière de nos bureaux, au 101 de la rue Bloor Ouest, dans l’allée adjacente à la rue St. Thomas.

Members, maintaining a professional online presence as you would in the classroom is very important. Learn how with our Maintaining Professionalism – Use of Electronic Communication and Social Media Professional Advisory: http://oct-oeeo.ca/zwqvbm

Discover key insights from our Focus on Teaching survey. Learn about the diverse backgrounds and experiences of Ontario Certified Teachers, their career paths, and their dedication to the profession: http://oct-oeeo.ca/syzt2c #OntEd #Ontario

Members, kickstart your school year by revisiting favourites from the Margaret Wilson Library. Did you know that the library offers a free shipping service for OCTs? Place a hold and we will ship it to you – free of charge. : http://oct-oeeo.ca/6aezsx #OntEd #Ontario

Applicants, did you know the College accepts documents from World Education Services (WES)? Ensure your transcripts are directly sent from your institution to WES, then request they be forwarded to us. Learn how: http://oct-oeeo.ca/szsrd4 #OntEd #Ontario
